name: Sand Adult Dragon
movement: walk 40 ft., burrow 30 ft., fly 80 ft.
description: The Sand Adult Dragon is a Huge dragon with a powerful presence, embodying elemental power and cunning, specially adapted to sandy environments.
memorable: This dragon can instill fear and blindness with its breath weapon while thriving in sandy terrain with its Sand Camouflage.
goals: To dominate regions and instill fear while utilizing its elemental powers.
relations: May command lesser creatures or be encountered alongside other elemental beings.
environment: Typically found in desert or sandy areas.
strengths: Has damage immunity to fire and resistances to piercing, with blindsight and a high passive perception.
weaknesses: Dependent on sandy terrain for its Sand Camouflage ability.
attacks: Utilizes a Multiattack of a Bite and two Claws, along with a Tail swipe, as well as powerful breath weapon attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Breath Weapon can cause both piercing and fire damage while potentially inflicting exhaustion through dehydration.
senses: Possesses blindsight at 60 feet and a high passive Perception score of 26.
skills: Demonstrates good Perception skills with a +4 modifier.
additional_information: Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failed saving throws thrice per day.
Sand Camouflage grants advantage on Stealth checks in sandy environments.
The Stinging Sand ability inflicts disadvantage on targets after a melee hit.
Fearsome Frightful Presence can scare enemies within a significant radius.
Unique Sandy Nature allows it to survive on half the necessary sustenance.
test_queries: huge sandy dragon with elemental powers
dragon that blinds foes with sand
dominant elemental dragon that attacks with sand
dragon with powerful bite and claw attacks
